resources.string: Welcome to the registration app from PlainTech. Here, you can login to enable the extra authentication option for getting messages to your mobile.

Step 1: Make sure you're logged in with Google play.
Step 2: Click on the Register with Google GCM button.
Step 3: Click on the log into PlainTech and insert your credentials.
Step 4: Login with extra authentication on the website!
Please use your credentials for logging into PlainTech. If valid, you can login again on the website with extra authentication checked.
